system.descriptionText: Comrade out of Cohesion performs the Disengage Action, Breaking off from Melee combat and making a Half Move. Opponents they were engaged with in Melee do not gain a free attack against the Comrade for Leaving Melee.

description.value: Comrade out of Cohesion performs the Disengage Action, Breaking off from Melee combat and making a Half Move. Opponents they were engaged with in Melee do not gain a free attack against the Comrade for Leaving Melee.
